Title: Serienjunkies News Reader
Description: Downloads the current RSS Feeds from serienjunkies.org. Allows to apply filters on teh result and contains the link to the page of the selected serie
HomeWiki:
***Announcement***

All who follows this project. I won’t continue on developing this one! I developed a reboot of the application on SerienNewsReaderV2. In that reboot I changed the settings dialog to be a little bite more comfortable and advanced the filter options. So please check it for yourself.

Of course the setup will still be available on Codeplex but don’t expect anything new here.

 

Project Description
Downloads the current RSS Feeds from serienjunkies.org. Allows to apply filters on the result and contains the link to the page of the selected serie where it can be downloaded.

Features

  • Create filters
  • Filter the news feed by your own created filter
  • Jump directly to the download page of your favorit series
